snippet: Some entrepreneurial doctors and patients have come up with Web sites and mobile apps to ease monitoring of a person’s vital signs and even make appointments.
abstract: Entrepreneurs are starting health care technology companies that change the way Americans interact with the system, responding to an evolving model of health care and bringing patient care and health insurance into the digital age.
lead_paragraph: Some entrepreneurial doctors and patients have come up with Web sites and mobile apps to ease monitoring of a person’s vital signs and even make appointments.

headline.seo: Start-Ups Use Technology in Patient-Doctor Relations
headline.main: Vital Signs by Phone, Then, With a Click, a Doctor’s Appointment
headline.print_headline: Vital Signs by Phone, Then, With a Click, A Doctor’s Appointment
